Question: Which of the following statements are true regarding 'The Mummy: Rise of the Aztecs'?
Options:
A. Brendan Fraser was supposedly on board for 'The Mummy: Rise of the Aztecs'.
B. Universal Pictures planned the fourth installment of The Mummy series.
C. Brendan Fraser starred in the original Mummy trilogy.
D. The Mummy: Rise of the Aztecs was released in 2017.
Answer: Brendan Fraser was supposedly on board for 'The Mummy: Rise of the Aztecs'., Universal Pictures planned the fourth installment of The Mummy series.

Options:
A. a) John Hannah was supposedly involved in the project.
